Name: Storybook Brawl
About the game: Draft your favorite characters from story and myth in this 8 player card battler! Over 40 different heroes to command. Will you side with the evil vampire, Snow Wight? Or team up with the good Princess Peep and her battle hardened sheep? Deep strategy meets enchanting fun in Storybook Brawl! CRAZY COMBOS! Draft characters to your party, combining abilities, effects and combos to deal the greatest damage. TONS OF HEROES! Choose from 40 different heroes with fun and unique powers to lead your battle. RARE TREASURES! Match 3 characters or complete a quest to create a supercharged version and earn a treasure. Weekly 100 PLAYER EVENTS! We run weekly 100 player events with increased prize pools.
